snippet: With names like Steven Tyler and Britney Spears and Neil Diamond supporting a piece of state legislation, how bad could it be? Pretty bad, actually.
abstract: Editorial criticizes measure being considered in Hawaii's Legislature that would give celebrities right to sue paparazzi and collect damages for taking unwanted photographs; praises lawmakers who have opposed bill.
lead_paragraph: With names like Steven Tyler and Britney Spears and Neil Diamond supporting a piece of state legislation, how bad could it be? Pretty bad, actually.

headline.print_headline: Bills of the Rich and Famous
headline.seo: Hawaii Grapples With the Steven Tyler Act
headline.main: Bills of the Rich and Famous
